patthana22.11:1.1: Nakusalaṃ naarūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo arūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana22.11:2.1: Nakusalaṃ nanaarūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato naarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
